title: Best Bits with Morgan and Special Guest Mike D: PART 1
itunes:title: Best Bits with Morgan and Special Guest Mike D: PART 1
description:
The Best Bits podcast is now officially separated into two podcasts!! This part of the podcast is the version you all have been wanting as a stand-alone, Morgan and a guest having their in-depth conversations without any interruptions. In this podcast you’ll hear Morgan and Mike D discuss the artists they’d love to see in concert this year, their thoughts on some topics from the show this week, and some food worlds! Plus they talk about what they believe in when it comes to paranormal activity and what TV show Mike D and Morgan’s boyfriend actually enjoy watching on the DL. Also they each shared the vacations they hope to go on this year and Mike D talks about his upcoming wedding anniversary.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
